word: Duty to the Blind and Handicapped. [WITH SUCH INSPIRED COUNSELS AS THESE IN MIND, THE CHRISTIAN RECORD PUBLISHING ASSOCIATION WAS ORGANIZED IN LINCOLN, NEBRASKA, TO REACH THE BLIND WITH GOD'S MESSAGE OF HOPE FOR THESE TIMES. SEE P. 410.]--I have been shown some things in reference to our duty to the unfortunate which I feel it my duty to write at this time.
